Syntype
MLP 145 . “
ARGENTINA
, Prov. Buenos Aires; H. Richter” / “Cotypus” printed on green label / “Bernhauer determ.” /
“ Cryptobium dubiosum
Brh.” handwritten by Bernhauer / “ 2716 ”.

Remarks. The current valid combination is
Ochthephilum dubium (
Blackwelder 1944
)
. Bernhauer wrote dubiusum in the label whereas the original publication mentions
dubium
. Although
Bernhauer ( 1934 a)
describes “
dubiosum ”
as a new species from Brazil in a footnote within the description given for “
dubium ”
, there is no doubt that this specimen is
Ochthephilum dubium
.
